cyl_coords¶

clustertools.util.coordinates.cyl_coords(cluster)[source]¶

NAME:

cyl_coords

PURPOSE:

Get the cylindrical coordinates of every star in the cluster

INPUT:

cluster - a StarCluster-class object

OUTPUT:

r,theta,z,vr,vtheta,vz

HISTORY:

2018 - Written - Webb (UofT)
